app.title: EPCalculator v2 - Error Probability Calculator
app.tagline: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Transmission Systems

params.title: Simulation Parameters
params.customConstellationHelp: Define your own constellation points with custom probabilities
params.fixErrors: Please fix the errors above before computing.

results.title: Simulation Results
results.computingHint: This may take a few moments depending on the parameters
results.errorProbabilityDesc: Probability that a transmitted symbol is received incorrectly
results.errorExponentDesc: Rate of exponential decay of error probability with code length
results.optimalRhoDesc: Optimal parameter value from the optimization process
results.computationTimeDesc: Time taken to compute the results
results.noResultsHint: Configure your simulation parameters and click "Compute Error Probability" to see results here.
results.optimizationValue: Gradient descent with adaptive step size

simulation.title: Error Probability Simulation
simulation.description: Configure modulation parameters and compute error probability bounds using information-theoretic analysis.

plottingPanel.title: Interactive Plotting
plottingPanel.description: Generate interactive plots to visualize error probability behavior across different parameter ranges.
plottingPanel.generatingHint: Computing data points and rendering visualization
plottingPanel.noPlotsHint: Configure your plotting parameters and simulation settings, then click "Generate Plot" to create visualizations.

plotting.title: Plotting Controls
plotting.mbNotAvailable: MB not available when β is on X-axis
plotting.mbDescription: Maxwell-Boltzmann distribution: Q(x) ∝ exp(-β|x|²). Higher β values concentrate probability on lower-energy symbols (probabilistic amplitude shaping).
plotting.affectsDistribution: Affects point distribution and range units
plotting.fixErrors: Please fix the errors above before plotting.
plotting.importHelp: Upload, enter manually, or paste data from Python, MATLAB, Excel, etc.
plotting.mergeOrNewDescription: A plot with the same axes already exists. Would you like to merge the new data or create a separate figure?

constellation.title: Custom Constellation
constellation.normalizeTooltip: Click to normalize constellation (probabilities sum to 1, mean energy = 1)
constellation.vizCaption: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
constellation.polarModeInfo: Polar: Magnitude |z| and Phase θ in degrees
constellation.nameDescription: This constellation doesn't match any standard type (PAM, PSK, QAM). Give it a name for easy identification.

dataImport.title: Import Data
dataImport.dragDrop: Drag and drop a file here, or click to select

validation.modulationPowerOf2: Modulation must be a power of 2 between 2 and 512
validation.qamPerfectSquare: QAM requires M to be a perfect square (4, 16, 64, 256)
validation.customConstellationInvalid: Custom constellation is not valid (check probability sum and energy)
validation.codeLengthRange: Code length must be between 1 and 1000000
validation.xRangeInvalid: X range must have two values with min < max
validation.x2RangeInvalid: X2 range must have two values with min < max
validation.x2PointsRange: X2 points must be between 1 and 101

plotItem.incompatibleAxes: Selected plots have incompatible axes (X1 and X2 must match)
plotItem.allAxesMustMatch: All selected plots must have matching axes (X1, X2, and Z)

footer.title: EPCalculator v2
footer.description: A modern implementation of error probability calculations for digital transmission systems.
footer.copyright: EPCalculator. Built with modern web technologies.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Communications
tutorial.singlePointDesc: Compute error probability for specific parameter values. Set modulation, SNR, and code rate to get instant results.
tutorial.plottingDesc: Generate interactive plots to explore how error probability changes across parameter ranges. Compare different configurations visually.
tutorial.pressEscHint: Press Enter or Esc to continue
tutorial.stepAxisScalesDesc: Each axis can be Linear or Logarithmic. For SNR axes, toggle between dB and linear units. The button shows the state it will switch to when clicked.
tutorial.stepTransposeDesc: Swap the X and Y axes to view the data from a different perspective.
tutorial.stepExportDesc: Export your plot as PNG, SVG for images, or CSV for raw data analysis.
tutorial.stepRemoveDesc: Remove this plot from your workspace. You can always generate it again.
tutorial.stepContourComparisonDesc: Select multiple contour plots using the checkboxes to compare them. Use Comparison to show differences between two plots, or Benchmark to overlay multiple 3D surfaces.
tutorial.stepConstellationDesc: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
tutorial.stepConstellationTableDesc: Edit point coordinates and probabilities precisely.
tutorial.stepConstellationLuckyDesc: Generate a random constellation with 2-16 points. The constellation is automatically normalized to have unit energy and probabilities summing to 1.
tutorial.stepConstellationHideTableDesc: Show or hide the points table to focus on the visual editor or get more precise control over point values.
